meanings.definition: The middle part of a person's body, between the chest and the waist.
meanings.sent1: She wrapped a measuring tape around her midsection to check her waist size.
meanings.sent2: His belt was too tight around his midsection after a big meal.
meanings.sent3: The cat somehow managed to squeeze through the tiny gap in the fence using its midsection.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed through the midsection of the valley, dividing it into two halves.
meanings.sent5: The hula hoop spun effortlessly around her midsection, showcasing her agility.

meanings.definition: The middle section of something, such as a piece of clothing or a building.
meanings.sent1: The designer added intricate embroidery to the midsection of the dress.
meanings.sent2: The midsection of the skyscraper featured a stunning glass facade.
meanings.sent3: The sandwich fell apart as the mayo dripped down the midsection onto his lap.
meanings.sent4: The fault line ran right through the midsection of the ancient ruins, splitting them in half.
meanings.sent5: The seamstress carefully stitched the lace trim onto the midsection of the blouse.
